name: Scoundrel's Charm
Lore: 'Sarcastic, Sardonic, Irreverent. Impertinent. Exasperating. Disrespectful. Outrageous and charming. Han was a scoundrel but Leia began to realize that she loved him.',
Text: 'Deploy from under Scoundrel''s Luck on a scoundrel. Once per turn, may peek at the top 3 cards of your Force pile and take one into hand; reshuffle. Once per turn, may use 1 Force to add or subtract 1 from an opponent''s just-drawn destiny.',
